quote: Big, ugly homes for big, ugly people,' I told Margo as we pulled into Casavilla.'No shit. If I ever end up being the kind of person who has one kid and seven bedrooms, do me a favor and shoot me.
quote_letters: BIG UGLY HOMES FOR BIG UGLY PEOPLE I TOLD MARGO AS WE PULLED INTO CASAVILLANO SHIT IF I EVER END UP BEING THE KIND OF PERSON WHO HAS ONE KID AND SEVEN BEDROOMS DO ME A FAVOR AND SHOOT ME
